profile.title: Profile Overview
profile.description: The Business Law Community FH UGM connects students, academics, and practitioners to advance business law expertise through research, publications, training, and strategic partnerships.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.visi: To become an adaptive, collaborative business law hub that creates impact for the broader business ecosystem.
misi: Drive business law publications that respond to industry dynamics.
Equip members with negotiation and contract-drafting capabilities.
Strengthen strategic partnerships and consulting programs for innovators, startups, and MSMEs.
